Key Match Events: Felicio Milson scored the winning goal in the 93rd minute of extra time to secure a 1-0 victory for Angola over Ghana
This was Angola's first win against Ghana since their 2023 Afcon qualifier, where Ghana won with a similar late goal
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first time since 6 February, 2000 that Ghana lost a game at the Kumasi sports stadium
